me.s3ns3iw00.jcommands.type

Class GlobalCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.s3ns3iw00.jcommands.Command
      • me.s3ns3iw00.jcommands.type.PrivateCommand
        • me.s3ns3iw00.jcommands.type.GlobalCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CategoryLimitable, ChannelLimitable, RoleLimitable, UserLimitable

    public class GlobalCommand
extends PrivateCommand
implements ChannelLimitable, CategoryLimitable
    An extended version of PrivateCommand that can be used also on servers and can be limited for channels and categories.
